translations: n.热衷搞迷信崇拜的人；邪教分子

phrs.translation: 异教徒模拟器, 密教模拟器

sentences.sentence: Twilight Hammer cultist named the Manipulator will come out of the portal and attack.
sentences.translation: 一个名叫操纵者的暮光信徒会从门出来攻击你。

sentences.sentence: Over the years there had been thisperson with the cake of soap, this cultist, and here he was.
sentences.translation: 很多年前，那个带着香皂的人就在这里了，这个虔诚的家伙，此刻他就在眼前。

sentences.sentence: The focus within the game is for the player to investigate the activity of an group of cultist.
sentences.translation: 玩家的任务是要调查某异教的组织的活动。
